# ContractAppURI.set() method

Set App URI

## Example

```javascript
const appURI = "ipfs://some_ipfs_hash";
await contract.appURI.set(appURI);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
set(appURI: string): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                             |
| --------- | ------ | --------------------------------------- |
| appURI    | string | the uri to set (typically an IPFS hash) |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[TransactionResult](./sdk.transactionresult.md)&gt;
